name: Corrupted Bits
description:
Corrupter Bit. A game made in C programming language and One File(Imagine the pain and agony).

I know this is a terrible game, but meh.

To start, click wherever you want to start the game.

Click the ON Bits to turn them off. You have a few seconds till the program aborts ;-)

There are also some corrupted bits that will cut your time shorter.

When you turned all bits OFF, You win.

To restart the game, just click on the screen..... twice.

Have fun.. I hope.

Source Code: https://github.com/ManiPM-85/Corrupted-Bits
